item.title: Fall 2022 Course
item.author: evans@virginia.edu (David Evans)
item.description: Welcome to the cs4501: Computational Biology / Biological Computing Fall 2022 course site. The Fall 2022 course is scheduled for Tuesdays and Thursdays, 12:30-1:45pm in Olsson Hall 120. The course will be similar to the Spring 2022 course (which you can explore here, including the Syllabus and Schedule. Versions of these for the Fall 2022 course will be posted here soon.
